content: Huh? Are those shellfish tongs? {A心虚目移}When you're beachcombing, remember not to gaze into the depths of the ocean... Hmmm... Don't ask why.
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持赶海钳-1005幻雪_引入语

content: I see you running around happily with those shellfish tongs. It's a shame I don't dare go with you. Lobster claws are my tails' arch nemesis.
